definition.name: Auto Merge Dependency Updates
definition.description: Enable auto-merge for a PR that only contains dependency updates, based on some rules.
definition.author: required gmbh

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: A personal access token used to authenticated with GitHub

inputs.name: allowed-actors
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of usernames auto merge is allowed for

inputs.name: allowed-update-types
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of types of updates that are allowed. Supported: [devDependencies|dependencies]:[major|minor|patch]

inputs.name: package-block-list
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of packages that auto merge should not be allowed for

inputs.name: merge-method
inputs.description: The merge method to use. Supported: MERGE, SQUASH, REBASE

inputs.name: merge-author-email
inputs.description: The email address to associate with the auto-merge

evidence.reasoning: The action focuses on automatically merging pull requests that contain dependency updates, which directly relates to dependency management. It also involves some automation aspects.
